Access Apify tools for web scraping, dat: Access Apify tools for web scraping, data extraction, and automation.
Find your API key on Apify in the settin: Find your API key on Apify in the settings, API & Integrations section.
Runs an Actor and returns all associated: Runs an Actor and returns all associated details.
Runs an Actor task and returns all assoc: Runs an Actor task and returns all associated details.
Retrieves a value stored in the key-valu: Retrieves a value stored in the key-value store under a specific key
Scrape a single URL using the Apify Webs: Scrape a single URL using the Apify Website Content Crawler Actor and get its content as markdown and HTML.
Select the dataset to get items from.
Number of items that should be skipped a: Number of items that should be skipped at the start. The default value is `0`.
Maximum number of results to return.
Select an Actor from the list.
Build to run. It can be either a build t: Build to run. It can be either a build tag or build number. By default, the run uses the build specified in the default run configuration (typically `latest`).
Memory limit for the run, in megabytes. The amount of memory can be set to one of the available options. By default, the run uses a memory limit specified in the default run configuration for the Actor.
Optional timeout for the run, in seconds: Optional timeout for the run, in seconds. By default, the run uses a timeout specified in the default run configuration for the Actor.
Enable this to receive the actual output: Enable this to receive the actual output of the Actor run as the response.
Select a task from the list.
Memory limit for the run, in megabytes. The amount of memory can be set to one of the available options. By default, the run uses a memory limit specified in the task settings.
Optional timeout for the run, in seconds: Optional timeout for the run, in seconds. By default, the run uses a timeout specified in the task settings.
Enable this to receive the actual output: Enable this to receive the actual output of the task run as the response.
The ID of the Key-Value Store.
The key of the record to be retrieved.
URL to be scraped. Must start with http:: URL to be scraped. Must start with http:// or https:// and be a valid URL.
The type of crawler to use.
Triggers a Flow on Apify Actor run event: Triggers a Flow on Apify Actor run events
Triggers a Flow on Apify Actor task run: Triggers a Flow on Apify Actor task run events
